title: RRB-NTPC 2025
short_description: RRB NTPC 2025 CBT paper for non-technical posts, covering General Awareness, Math, and Reasoning.
description:
### Railway Recruitment Board - NTPC 2025

**Post:** Non-Technical Popular Categories (Undergraduate & Graduate)

This paper covers the syllabus for the **Computer Based Test (CBT)** for posts such as Junior Clerk, Accounts Clerk, and Station Master.

**Sections:**
1.  **General Awareness (40 Marks):** Current Affairs, History, Geography, Polity.
2.  **Mathematics (30 Marks):** Arithmetic, Number Systems, Data Interpretation.
3.  **General Intelligence & Reasoning (30 Marks):** Analogies, Coding-Decoding, Puzzles.
